messages.content: What are the latest deal wins and contract announcements from TCS in last 6 months? Also show total contract value TCV and pipeline.

Here are the latest deal wins and contract announcements from TCS in the last 6 months:

1. **TCS wins $1bn+ Telefónica UK contract**: In December 2025, TCS announced that it has won a contract worth over $1 billion from Telefónica UK, a leading telecommunications company in the UK. [Source: TechMarketView](https://www.techmarketview.com/ukhotviews/archive/2025/12/18/tcs-wins-1bn-telefnica-uk-contract)

2. **TCS Q2-2026 Earnings Call**: In the quarter ended September 2025, TCS reported strong deal wins with a total contract value (TCV) of $10 billion, up 16% year-on-year. This includes a major AI-led deal with Tryg. [Source: Alpha Spread](https://www.alphaspread.com/security/nse/tcs/investor-relations/earnings-call/q2-2026)

Regarding the total contract value (TCV) and pipeline:

* **TCV**: In Q2-2026, TCS reported a TCV of $10 billion. For the full year FY24, TCS reported a record TCV of $42.7 billion, with a Q4FY24 TCV record of $13.2 billion. [Source: ICICI Direct](https://www.icicidirect.com/research/equity/rapid-results/tata-consultancy-services-ltd)
* **Pipeline**: While the exact pipeline value is not publicly disclosed, TCS has reported a strong deal wins momentum in recent quarters. In the December quarter, the company reported $9.3 billion in deal TCV, surpassing analyst estimates of $7-9 billion. [Source: Moneycontrol](https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/business/information-technology/tcs-ceo-k-krithivasan-betting-on-strong-fy26-deal-wins-to-fuel-growth-in-fy27-13771045.html)

Please note that the information provided is based on publicly available data and may not reflect the current pipeline or TCV values, which may have changed since the last public update.
